title: Album Leaf Poem
marks:
Signature, Date, Inscription, and Marks

at left L center:  [ ????? ]; date L center, black ink: [
description: six full lines of bold, neat characters, evenly spaced; seventh line is half the length; three more lines (middle line is shorter) with smaller characters at L; gold colored outline around text; barrel shaped seal at URC; two seals at LLC
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
